dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, did you catch the news about Kazakhstan's first nuclear power plant?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, did you catch the news about Kazakhstan's first nuclear power plant?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, uh, no, I actually missed that. What's up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, uh, no, I actually missed that. What's up?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the construction timeline for it, it might actually reach, like, 12 years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the construction timeline for it, it might actually reach, like, twelve years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The construction timeline for Kazakhstan™s first nuclear power plant may reach 12 years, the Atomic Energy Agency reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Twelve years? Wow, that's, um, quite a while, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twelve years? Wow, that's, um, quite a while, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Atomic Energy Agency, their press service, reported it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Atomic Energy Agency, their press service, reported it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The construction timeline for Kazakhstan™s first nuclear power plant may reach 12 years, the Atomic Energy Agency reported. According to the agency's press service...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's the estimated completion date then, if it's that long?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's the estimated completion date then, if it's that long?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They're looking at somewhere between 2035 and 2036.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're looking at somewhere between twenty thirty five and twenty thirty six.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the agency's press service, the estimated completion date for the construction of the nuclear power plant in Kazakhstan is between 2035 and 2036.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Gosh, that feels like a really long time away, doesn't it? [interrupts] Or is that normal?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gosh, that feels like a really long time away, doesn't it? Or is that normal?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Well, actually, it's pretty standard. Global practice usually shows, like, 10 to 12 years from design to commissioning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, actually, it's pretty standard. Global practice usually shows, like, ten to twelve years from design to commissioning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global practice shows that the period from design to construction and commissioning of a nuclear power plant takes 10 to 12 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it's, um, it's not unusual then. That makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it's, um, it's not unusual then. That makes sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And Rosatom, the Russian company, they're confirming these plans, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And Rosatom, the Russian company, they're confirming these plans, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rosatom confirms compliance with these plans, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Rosatom? I thought they were involved somehow. What's their specific role here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rosatom? I thought they were involved somehow. What's their specific role here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah, they were selected earlier as the leader of the international consortium building it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah, they were selected earlier as the leader of the international consortium building it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Atomic Energy Agency reported that Rosatom had been selected as the leader of the international consortium for the construction of the first nuclear power plant in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, so they're, like, spearheading the whole thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, so they're, like, spearheading the whole thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. It's a massive undertaking, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. It's a massive undertaking, obviously.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. Big project for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. Big project for Kazakhstan.
